That is all.
jogabilidade e interação com os jogadores online

Esse jogo e uma porra só tem hack mas eu gosto <3

Я полу-професиональный игрок в этой игре. 
Могу сказать что игра интересная только тогда , когда ты чего то добиваешься в ней.
Играйте в команде , и игра станет интереснее.
very fun game should buy coz its simple
Meh its really fun to smurf and get called a cheater.  Kids arnt the greatest anymore so they instantly call cheats
I like this game because I get to play with my brother and also this game has a feel that makes it equalivant to R6S or other games like that.
Amazing team game. Easy to get addicted to, especially while trying to learn the game.
Игра, очень изменилась, и стало интересно играть!
muito bom. O melhor jogo de todos os tempos, sem dúvida alguma!
Tem q melhorar coisa pra krlh, no momento ta uma bosta, adiciona mapa, adiciona skin, mas de resto ta foda

Very recommended, its a addicting game, and the game is a never ending loop so you can play till your heart content. If you wanna buy this game, i recommend you to find a friend to play together because this game rely on comms and info to win.

Не знаю как вам но мне иногда надоедает игра.Всё потому-что часто пободаются читеры или-же токсики в тиме которые не умеют играть,да и ещё иногда оружие просто не наносит определёного урона.А так игра прикольная что-бы провести своё свободное время.
buen juego, lamentable la actualización, hace que sea mucho mas pesado para computadoras que no tienen una gran capacidad.
Good game but hackers are everywhere
Very fun game to pick up. You actually have to learn the game to be good at it. very fun fps 10/10
игра говно,но мне понравилось купаться в нем

im an autigender cisgender transphobe and there is girl character now so i dont feel excluded anymore

I think there is something for every1 in CS:GO. I had some health challenges one year, leaving me with no energy. Playing (the old 1.6 version of CS) stimulated adrenaline and helped me get back on my feet. Nothing wrong today. So, ofc I love this game, even from an amateur point of view.
хуйня для геев, которые долбятся в жопу
Pretty dead game, community is toxic, pretty unfun overall.  Extremely high skill ceiling games that are 10 years old should be removed from steam store.
its really fun but the players can be a bit toxic sometimes
в ней можно убить много времени
Overall great game for when it comes to PC gaming.
this is an iconic game of all the time
pretty cool game. have fun, but ranks need fixing
Good Game most of the time
